alert.note: Alert for Sierra Madre Range; Snowy Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 26 at 1:55PM MST until January 28 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 PM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Extended period of heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 16 to 28 inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 MPH. * WHERE...Sierra Madre Range and Snowy Range. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 5 PM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Those outdoors could easily become disoriented and lost. Visibility near zero at times with moderate to heavy snow and blowing snow. Snowmobilers, cross country skiers and hikers are particularly at risk.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
